room_title: Escape room "Sweet Shoppe" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
room_description:
It’s the job interview of all interviews; Mrs. C is finally hiring a full team of employees for her world famous candy store!
As a strong believer of trial by fire, Mrs. C has challenged you to prove you have what it takes to handle her Sweet Shoppe by completing a series of tasks to ready the store before it opens for the day. And after a not so quick breakfast at the Chocolate Bar Tavern & Lounge, your team is left with an hour to impress the owner.
In order to get these sweet positions, your team will have to work together in order to find clues, notice the small details and solve all of Mrs. C’s puzzles in less than 60 minutes.
Will you be hired or fired?
